title: We've been told social distancing restrictions will remain until a vaccine. Do we know when that will be?
description: The New South Wales Premier says social distancing restrictions will be in place "until a vaccine is found". But what exactly goes into developing a vaccine for a new disease?
content:
New South Wales Premier Gladys Berejiklian has warned that social distancing restrictions will be in place in her state "until a vaccine is found". 
But what exactly goes into developing a vaccine for a new disease? And how long will that take?
